content: The URL used for the single sign-on on the Identity provider side

comment.text: The translation key "SignOnEndpointUrlTooltip" is used to display the tooltip text explaining the URL used for single sign-on on the Identity provider side. It appears in a tooltip associated with a button that configures this setting.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "عنوان رابط المستخدم للدخول الأحادي من جانب مزود الهوية" is a literal translation and doesn't convey the meaning effectively in natural Arabic. 'الدخول الأحادي' (single sign-on) is commonly understood but can be clunky. 'من جانب مزود الهوية' is also quite literal and can be simplified.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation might be: "عنوان الرابط المستخدم لتسجيل الدخول الموحد من جهة موفر الهوية" or "عنوان الرابط لتسجيل الدخول الأحادي من موفر الهوية".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'عنوان رابط المستخدم' is somewhat awkward. The word 'مستخدم' (user) isn't strictly necessary and adds unnecessary complexity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'المستخدم' - "عنوان رابط للدخول الأحادي..." is more concise.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'единично' is technically correct, but 'еднократно' would be more common and natural in this context, particularly when describing single sign-on.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът, използван за еднократно вписване от страната на доставчика на идентичност

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure could be improved for better flow.  The placement of 'от страната на' can be slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL адресът, използван за еднократно вписване при доставчика на идентичност

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English content refers to the URL being *used* for single sign-on. The Finnish translation 'Kertakirjautumisessa käytetty URL...' (URL used in single sign-on...) while technically correct, could be improved to more directly convey the same meaning - the endpoint URL itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kertakirjautumisen päätepiste URL identiteetintarjoajan puolella

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL-ն, որն օգտագործվում է Identity մատակարարի կողմից մեկ մուտքի համար' is not a precise translation of 'The URL used for the single sign-on on the Identity provider side'. It literally translates to 'The URL that is used by the Identity provider for one entry.'  'Single sign-on' is not well conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation like: 'Համակարգում մեկ մուտքի համար օգտագործվող URL-ը Identity մատակարարի կողմից' or 'Identity մատակարարի կողմից մեկ մուտքի տեղաբաշխման համար օգտագործվող URL-ը։'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a punctuation mark (։) at the end.  This might not be appropriate and should be reviewed for consistency with other translated content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Review and adjust the final punctuation to match established style guides or existing translated content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ID 제공자 측의 싱글 사인온에 사용되는 URL' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Korean. It's overly technical and verbose. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the purpose of the URL.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID 제공자를 통한 싱글 사인온에 사용되는 URL (ID 제공자를 통한 싱글 사인온을 위한 URL)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the sentence structure could be improved for better readability in Korean. It feels slightly stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 싱글 사인온에 사용되는 URL은 ID 제공자 측에서 사용됩니다. (The URL used for single sign-on is used on the Identity provider side)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and doesn't flow naturally in Lao. 'ດ້ານຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການ Identity' is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'Identity provider side' more elegantly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL ທີ່ໃຊ້ສໍາລັບການເຂົ້າສູ່ລະບົບດຽວຂອງຜູ້ໃຫ້ບໍລິການຕົວຕົນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation "Vienotās pierakstīšanās vietrādis URL identitātes nodrošinātāja pusē" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "The URL used for the single sign-on on the Identity provider side". "Vietrādis" implies a round trip or bidirectional connection, which isn't necessarily the meaning in this context. It's also a slightly uncommon word.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more suitable translation could be: "Vienotās pierakstīšanās URL identitātes nodrošinātāja pusē" or "URL, kas izmantojams vienotās pierakstīšanās procesā identitātes nodrošinātāja pusē".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation lacks clarity and flow compared to the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to improve readability, potentially using a more conversational tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'O URL utilizado para o início de sessão único do lado do fornecedor de Identidade' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Portuguese. 'Início de sessão único' is a technically correct translation of 'single sign-on' but a more common and easily understood phrase would be 'autenticação única'. Also, 'fornecedor de Identidade' could be simplified to 'provedor de identidade'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O URL utilizado para a autenticação única no lado do provedor de identidade.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'අනන්‍යතා ප්‍රතිපාදකයාගේ පස තනි පිවිසුම සඳහා මෙම ඒ.ස.නි. භාවිතා කරයි' is not a precise translation of "The URL used for the single sign-on on the Identity provider side".  'පස' (pasa) translates to 'side' or 'aspect', which is not quite right in this context. 'ඒ.ස.නි.' (A.S.Ni.) appears to be an abbreviation and its meaning is unclear without context. The sentence structure is also a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation might be: "අනන්‍යතා සැපයුම්කරුගේ තනි පිවිසුමට යෙදෙන URL මෙය" (Ananithatha sappayumkaru gae thani pivisumae yedane URL mena)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses Sinhala script which is correct, but needs to be formatted appropriately for display, ensuring proper kerning and rendering based on the intended platform.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure proper Sinhala font rendering and spacing for readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "Идентитетског" is misspelled. The correct spelling is "Идентитетског".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Идентитетског

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL koji se koristi za jednokratnu prijavu na strani Identitetskog pružaoca' is a bit literal and could be improved for clarity and naturalness in Serbian. 'Jednokratna prijava' is correct, but the whole phrase feels a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL korišćen za jednokratnu prijavu na strani Identity provajdera.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'strani' is placed awkwardly. While grammatically correct, it's not the most common construction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL korišćen za jednokratnu prijavu kod Identity provajdera.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'URL-адреса, яка використовується для єдиного входу на стороні постачальника посвідчень' is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'постачальника посвідчень' (postachal'nyka posvidchen') is a correct translation for 'Identity Provider' but sounds somewhat formal in this context. A more common phrasing would be simpler.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса для входу через єдиний профіль на стороні постачальника ідентифікації

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'стороні постачальника' (storoni postachal'nyka) could be shortened to 'на стороні'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: URL-адреса для входу через єдиний профіль на стороні постачальника ідентифікації
